name: Eric Lopez
description: It was a very nice idea for this nice laptop. It is very easy to use and there is no problems so far. I am so happy that I bought this laptop.

name: Diane James
description: OMG! This is the best laptop I ever see. It runs so smooth. There was no problems when I use it. It saves so much time because I am a rect developer.

name: Beverly Perry
description: I really recommend this laptop. I used it for one year and there where no slight problem. It runs so quickly and it secure your privacy.

name: Lois Ramirez
description: This laptop is so awesome. I am a web developer so I need a first laptop to increase my production. This laptop helps me to write code and runs that so smoothly.

name: Walter Miller
description: I used many laptop and computer in my life. But those became slow after few days. But I am using this laptop for 6 months and the seep doesn't decrease at all!

name: Rose Gray
description: This laptop performs very well. I helped me so much to do my interviews for web development companies. The sound quality is so nice and it is very fast.
